people_behind_strategy.title: THE PEOPLE BEHIND THE STRATEGY
people_behind_strategy.intro: We're Jane and Aimun — partners in life and in business. We built Centaura Group on a simple belief: business owners deserve more than a "market rate" exit. You've poured your life into building something remarkable. We believe you deserve the strategy, structure, and lasting impact that honours that work.

jane.name: Jane Jawad
jane.title: Corporate Transformation & Technology Strategist
bio: For more than two decades, I've guided global corporations through complexity and transformation. My career began at Accenture and later as Vice President in a global professional services firm, where I learned what disciplined change can do for organizations.

Today, I bring that same discipline into the entrepreneurial space, helping mid-market leaders cut through operational chaos, embrace AI-driven efficiency, and scale with clarity and confidence. Transformation isn't just about technology; it's about giving owners the freedom and structure to focus on what matters most.

aimun.name: Aimun Jawad
aimun.title: Entrepreneurial Dealmaker & M&A Specialist
bio: Where Jane simplifies complexity, I thrive on uncovering hidden value. My journey has been less traditional — starting in aeronautical engineering and international oil & gas, then moving into entrepreneurship, joint ventures, and real estate models.

Since 2020, I've focused on valuations, roll-ups, and exit strategies. One of my favorite projects? Scaling a small Dubai bicycle shop from $600k to $2.5M by reimagining its e-commerce and operations. For me, the thrill is in spotting overlooked potential and structuring deals that unlock it.

left.title: Why We Built Centaura
content: Again and again, we saw the same painful pattern: owners pouring decades into their businesses, only to sell underprepared, undervalued, and under-advised. We knew there was a better way.

That's why we created Centaura — to bridge ambition with action, to combine corporate transformation discipline with entrepreneurial dealmaking, and to architect exits that maximize value while preserving the foundations you've built.

right.title: A Global Perspective
content: Centaura was never meant to be bound by borders. With our headquarters in the UK and hubs in Dubai and Singapore, we serve clients across Europe, North America, the Middle East, and Southeast Asia.
Our vision is to remain globally mobile, untethered from geography but deeply rooted in what never changes: trust, strategy, and results.

final_word.label: Final Word
final_word.title: The Exit You Build vs. The Exit You Get
content: Here's the truth most advisors won't tell you:
Your exit isn't determined the day you decide to sell.
It's determined by the decisions you make 12–36 months before.
Will you modernize or maintain the status quo?
Will you partner with strategists or settle for brokers?
The business you've built deserves a world-class exit.
Not "market rate." Not "good enough." Premium. Protected. On your terms.
